message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm really interested, but $180 is a bit outside my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $140?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. I can do $160, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $160 is still a little more than I'd like to pay. How about $155? I really want this product, but that's my absolute limit.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $165, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
